name: Qupyter
short: Run IPython kernel within Red and connect to it with Jupyter Console. This is a development tool.
description:
Run IPython kernel within Red and connect to it with Jupyter Console. This is a development tool.

WARNING: This cog is meant for development instances and should NOT ever be used in production environment.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Qupyter. If anything doesn't work, you can report it on my issue tracker at <https://github.com/Jackenmen/JackCogs/issues>.

**Warning:** This cog is meant for development instances and should NOT ever be used in production environment.

This cog copies a kernel app's connection file to data path.
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
